entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
